prompt: Photorealistic wide shot of a fully restored, gleaming 1950s Pepsi-Cola Vendo 81 vending machine standing proudly in a brightly lit, clean collector's garage or workshop. The machine is positioned slightly off-center following the rule of thirds, allowing vintage automotive memorabilia or tools to be subtly visible in the background. Sunlight streams in from a high window, highlighting the pristine chrome details, vibrant red and blue paint, and classic Pepsi logo. Focus is sharp on the machine, emphasizing its mint condition as a high-value collectible. Style: Professional product photography, hyperrealistic. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: value-of-old-pepsi-machine-image-1.png

prompt: Dramatic, atmospheric shot inside a dusty, dimly lit barn. An unrestored, mid-century Pepsi vending machine, showing signs of age with faded paint and minor rust spots, sits partially covered by a canvas tarp. Positioned deep in the frame with leading lines created by wooden beams overhead. A single shaft of light pierces the gloom, illuminating the front of the machine and hinting at its hidden potential value. The overall mood is one of discovery and neglect. Style: Cinematic realism, moody lighting. --ar 16:9
name: value-of-old-pepsi-machine-image-2.png

prompt: Close-up, shallow depth-of-field photograph focusing on an antique appraiser's hands carefully examining the original coin mechanism and embossed logo detail of a vintage 1960s Pepsi machine. The machine's textured, slightly worn surface is visible. The background is softly blurred, suggesting a cluttered antique shop or workshop setting. Lighting is focused and directional, highlighting the textures and details being inspected, emphasizing the process of valuation. Style: Documentary photography, macro detail. --ar 16:9
name: value-of-old-pepsi-machine-image-3.png

prompt: A warmly lit, inviting scene inside a retro-themed home basement game room or 'man cave'. A classic, working 1950s round-top Pepsi machine glows softly in the corner, casting a warm light. It's positioned as a functional centerpiece, surrounded by other vintage decor like neon signs, a pool table, or arcade games (partially visible). The composition uses the machine as an anchor point on one side of the 16:9 frame, balancing the rest of the room's elements. Style: Lifestyle photography, nostalgic ambiance. --ar 16:9
name: value-of-old-pepsi-machine-image-4.png

prompt: Clean, professional studio photograph comparing two vintage Pepsi machines side-by-side against a neutral grey backdrop. On the left, a perfectly restored, vibrant machine; on the right, an identical model in 'as-found', original condition with visible wear, patina, and minor dents. The wide 16:9 frame captures both machines fully, allowing direct comparison of condition and its impact on perceived value. Lighting is even and bright, typical of catalogue or appraisal photography. Style: Comparative product photography, hyperrealistic. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: value-of-old-pepsi-machine-image-5.png
